CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( NNR_or_NOT__c , 'Pay & Walk'), IF( Submitter_Assignment_Date__c + 60 > Landlord_Signed_Agreement__c , true, false), false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: "Start: Submitter is first identified End: Landlord Signed Agreement (Date)" "Only applicable if ""LTA"" is selected, not ""NNR/NOT"" If <=60 days, then flag this PO needing to be issued"
CustomField.label: Schedule Incentive Payment #2
